🌿 *“Jo Allah par bharosa karta hai, Allah uske liye kaafi hai.”* — [Surah At-Talaq 65:3]
🕊️ *“Namaz burai aur fahashi se rokti hai.”* — [Surah Al-Ankabut 29:45]
🌙 *“Allah sabr karne walon ke saath hai.”* — [Surah Al-Baqarah 2:153]
🕌 *“Jo shakhs Allah ke raaste mein chalta hai, uske liye jannat hai.”*
